citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 pm on 13-DEC-
22. Arrived at the facility and called and texted the licensee. She responded that she was not available for an inspection
today.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 pm on 13-DEC-
22.  Arrived at the facility and called and texted the licensee.  She responded that she was not available for an inspection 
today. 
 
 
 
End Section
